QuestData.Title: The Source of Our Livelihood
QuestData.Description: We have done as Master Shang asked of us. I will return to the temple to inform the master of our progress. You should continue south on the road to the farmlands to seek out Wugou, the spirit of earth.$B$BJi awaits you at the Dai-Lo Farmstead, and he'll surely need your help. I must warn you, Ji can be reckless in his directness. Remember well the things I have taught you: discipline and patience.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ji at the Dai-Lo Farmstead. A cart is waiting near the road to take you there.
